description:
Younger brother of Junpei Azuma, in the same year as Kou. Yuuhei transferred to Seishuu High School in order play baseball on the first-string team, and remains after the coach is dismissed. He has trouble recalling other people`s names and faces, but he remembers meeting Kou at the Tsukishima Batting Center several months before transferring to Seishuu. He lost some of his self-confidence after his transfer, but seeing Kou`s abilities during the practice game boosted his spirits.
Junpei injured his leg, ending his rising baseball career, while saving Yuuhei from falling down a staircase. Since then, Yuuhei has been very careful around all stairs and the guilt gave him a renewed drive to make it to the Koushien. He currently has stated romantic interests in Aoba.
name: Azuma Yuuhei
